content: Dog Walking Safety App
A mobile application that connects dog owners with dog walkers who are trained in handling difficult or aggressive dogs, and indicate safe walking routes.
GPS tracking, in-app messaging, dog walker certification, real-time updates, emergency buttons
Wag!, Rover, Fetch! Pet Care, Pet sitters International, Care.com
Certified dog walkers with experience in handling aggressive dogs
Portable Dog Safety Barrier

A foldable dog barrier that creates a barrier around the dog for safety during walks. It provides a safe space for dogs to play, rest or eat while protecting them from aggressive dogs or busy streets.
Lightweight, portable, easy to use, adjustable, durable
Carlson Pet Products, Richell USA, MidWest Homes for Pets, PAWLAND, PAWISE
Foldable design for easy storage and transportation
Dog GPS Tracker
A GPS tracker that attaches to the dog's collar and sends real-time location alerts to the owner's mobile device. It allows owners to track their dog's location to ensure they stay safe during walks.
Real-time tracking, activity monitoring, waterproof, long battery life, lightweight
Whistle, FitBark, Garmin, Link AKC, Tractive
Waterproof design for all weather conditions
LED Lighted Dog Vest
A high visibility dog vest with LED lights that ensures dogs are visible to vehicles and pedestrians during night walks.
Lightweight, adjustable, LED lights, reflective, washable
Nite Ize, Noxgear, Illumiseen, Ruffwear, BSEEN
Reflective and LED lights for increased visibility
pain_point_description: owners may worry about the safety of their dog on walks, such as encountering aggressive dogs or busy roads
